sentences.sentence: Purpose: to find out some reliable evidences on the sonograms of pheochromocytoma (pheo) to clinch clinical diagnosis.
sentences.translation: 目的：旨在探寻嗜铬细胞瘤(PHEO)声像图规律，为临床诊治提供可靠依据。

sentences.sentence: Objective To evaluate the histopathological basis which determines the sonograms echo characteristic of liver solid masses.
sentences.translation: 目的了解决定肝实性占位病变超声回声特性的病理组织学基础。

sentences.sentence: Objective To explore different appearances of fibrinous string on sonograms of tuberculous and malignant pleural effusions.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨结核性和恶性胸腔积液中纤维回声带的不同表现。
